TITLE.KICKED_OUT: You have been kicked from the game

MESSAGE.NOT_ENOUGH_PLAYERS: At least {min} players are required to start the game
MESSAGE.CONFIRM_START_GAME: Are you sure you want to start the game?
MESSAGE.ROOM_LOCKED: You must lock the room to start the game
MESSAGE.QUIT_GAME: Do you want to quit the game?
MESSAGE.KICKED_OUT: The administrator has decided to remove you from the game. You will be redirected to the home page.
MESSAGE.DRAW_GAME: All players have abandoned. You will be redirected to the home page.
MESSAGE.FELL: You slipped on the ice. Your turn is over.
MESSAGE.END_FIGHT: The fight is over. The winner of the fight is {winner}
MESSAGE.DEFAULT_FIGHT_WIN: The opponent abandoned the game. You win the fight by default.
MESSAGE.MAX_PLAYERS: You cannot add more virtual players
MESSAGE.ADD_BOT_WHEN_LOCKED: Unlock the waiting room before adding a virtual player
MESSAGE.QUIT_POST_GAME_LOBBY: You would leave the end game page
MESSAGE.QUIT_MESSAGE_LOST_CHANGES: All unsaved changes will be lost, are you sure you want to leave this page?
MESSAGE.CANCELED_MATCH: The game has been canceled. You will be redirected to the main menu.

GAME_CREATION.SELECT_BEFORE_CREATING_GAME: Please select a map before creating a new game
GAME_CREATION.HIDDEN_GAME: The selected map is hidden or doesn't exist
GAME_CREATION.INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS: You do not have enough funds to create a game with this entry fee

TOOLTIP.HEALTH: Character health points correspond to this attribute. Increase the health or speed attribute value by +2.
TOOLTIP.SPEED: Speed points determine turn order and also correspond to movement points per turn for a character. Increase the health or speed attribute value by +2.
TOOLTIP.ATTACK: Attack points represent the force with which an attack is made on the opponent. Choose one of the attack or defense attributes to receive a bonus based on a 6-sided or 4-sided die.
TOOLTIP.DEFENSE: Defense points represent the ability to block an opponent's attack. Choose one of the attack or defense attributes to receive a bonus based on a 6-sided or 4-sided die.

WAITING_PAGE.TITLE: Pre-Game Lobby
WAITING_PAGE.MAX_PLAYERS_CANT_UNLOCK: The waiting room has reached the maximum number of players. You cannot unlock the game.

DEFENSIVE.TITLE: Defensive
DEFENSIVE.DESCRIPTION_1: Tends to flee from battle if injured
DEFENSIVE.DESCRIPTION_2: Engages less in combat and favors items that provide defense and maximum HP advantages

AGGRESSIVE.TITLE: Aggressive
AGGRESSIVE.DESCRIPTION_1: Tends to seek battle and will never try to flee
AGGRESSIVE.DESCRIPTION_2: Favors confrontations and items that provide attack and speed advantages

MANAGE_GAME.MAP_SIZE_AND_MODE_PROMPT: Please choose map size and game mode

MAP_VALIDATOR.REDIRECT_MESSAGE: You will be redirected to the administration page
MAP_VALIDATOR.ERROR_DUPLICATE_NAME: A map with the same name already exists.
MAP_VALIDATOR.ERROR_TOO_MANY_OBJECTS: There are too many objects on this map. {current} objects instead of {max}.
MAP_VALIDATOR.ERROR_TOO_FEW_OBJECTS: There are not enough objects on the map. The minimum is {min}, but there are currently {current}.
MAP_VALIDATOR.ERROR_INVALID_DOOR: At least one door is invalid.
MAP_VALIDATOR.ERROR_INVALID_DOOR_DETAILS: Each door must be placed between two walls on one axis and between two terrain tiles on the other.
MAP_VALIDATOR.ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_TERRAIN: At least half of the tiles must be covered with terrain tiles (grass, water, ice, etc.).
MAP_VALIDATOR.ERROR_INACCESSIBLE_TILES: Not all terrain tiles are accessible.
MAP_VALIDATOR.ERROR_MISSING_FLAG: The flag must be placed on the map when in CTF mode.
MAP_VALIDATOR.ERROR_MISSING_SPAWN_POINTS: All spawn points must be placed on the map.
MAP_VALIDATOR.ERROR_INVALID_TITLE: The map title must be between 3 and 30 characters long and cannot consist of spaces only.
MAP_VALIDATOR.ERROR_INVALID_DESCRIPTION: The map description must be between 10 and 128 characters long and cannot consist of spaces only.

ERRORS.INVALID_FORMAT: The code must be composed of 4 digits
ERRORS.FRIENDS_ONLY_ACCESS: This game is reserved for the host's friends
ERRORS.INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS: Insufficient funds to enter this game
ERRORS.HAS_BLOCKED_USERS_IN_ROOM: You cannot join this game because a player has blocked you.
ERRORS.BLOCKED_BY_USER_IN_ROOM: You cannot join this game because a player has blocked you.

LOGS.WIN_COMBAT: {playerName} won the combat. The combat is over!
LOGS.NO_WINNER_COMBAT: Combat ended with no winner between {playerName} and {defenderName}.
LOGS.ATTACK_SUCCESS: {playerName} succeeded in their attack with {damage} damage.

FRIENDS.TITLE: Friends
FRIENDS.REMOVE_FRIEND_MESSAGE: Do you want to remove {username} from your friends list?
FRIENDS.BLOCK_USER_MESSAGE_FRIEND: Block {username}? This will also remove them from your friends.
FRIENDS.FRIEND_REQUEST_REJECTED_MESSAGE: You rejected the friend request from {username}

ERRORS.CANNOT_SEND_TO_YOURSELF: You cannot send a friend request to yourself.
ERRORS.CANNOT_SEND_TO_USER: You cannot send a request to this user.
ERRORS.CANNOT_SEND_TO_BLOCKED: You cannot send a request to a user you have blocked.
ERRORS.USER_ALREADY_SENT_REQUEST: This user has already sent you a friend request.

USER.LOG_OUT_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to log out?
USER.DELETE_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible.

DIALOG.BACKGROUND_NOT_OWNED: You do not own this background
DIALOG.DELETE_ACCOUNT_MESSAGE: Do you really want to delete this account?
DIALOG.NO_CHANGES_MESSAGE: No changes detected. Please modify at least one field.

BACKGROUND.TITLE: Background
BACKGROUND.SUBTITLE: Select a background from your owned ones
BACKGROUND.NO_BACKGROUNDS: You do not own any backgrounds.
BACKGROUND.VISIT_STORE: Visit the store to buy some!

THEME.TITLE: Theme
THEME.NO_THEME: You do not own any themes, please visit the store to purchase some.

ACCOUNT_INFO.TITLE: Account Information
ACCOUNT_INFO.USERNAME_NO_SPACES_MIN: Minimum 3 characters, must not contain spaces
ACCOUNT_INFO.EMAIL_NO_SPACES: Email address must not contain spaces

MODIFY_ACCOUNT_ERRORS.USERNAME_LENGTH: Username must be between 3 and 20 characters
MODIFY_ACCOUNT_ERRORS.EMAIL_EXISTS: Email already associated with an account

TRIDENT.NAME: Poseidon's Trident
TRIDENT.DESCRIPTION: If you have one action point left at the end of your turn, gain one more at the start of your next turn, up to a maximum of 2.

ARMOR.NAME: Achilles' Armor
ARMOR.DESCRIPTION: +2 attack. If your attack is blocked, take 1 damage.

SANDAL.NAME: Winged Sandals
SANDAL.DESCRIPTION: x2 speed but reduces your maximum health by 1.

LIGHTNING.NAME: Zeus' Lightning
LIGHTNING.DESCRIPTION: x2 attack but reduces defense by 2 and health by 1.

XIPHOS.NAME: Xiphos
XIPHOS.DESCRIPTION: If you have less than 50% health, your opponent loses 1 defense and you gain 2 attack.

KUNEE.NAME: Kunee
KUNEE.DESCRIPTION: Allows you to pass through walls, which are considered tiles with a cost of 1. If you end a turn on a wall, you will be placed on a nearby tile.

FLAG.NAME: Flag
FLAG.DESCRIPTION: Capture the Flag mode item. Return to your spawn with the flag to win!

WATER.NAME: Water
WATER.DESCRIPTION: Tool used to place a water tile with a movement cost of two. Place the tile with a left click on an existing tile.

ICE.NAME: Ice
ICE.DESCRIPTION: Tool used to place an ice tile with a movement cost of zero. Place the tile with a left click on an existing tile.

WALL.NAME: Wall
WALL.DESCRIPTION: Tool used to place a wall tile that blocks movement through it. Place the tile with a left click on an existing tile.

DOOR.NAME: Door
DOOR.DESCRIPTION: Tool used to place a door that can be opened or closed. Place the tile with a left click on an existing tile. Clicking an existing door toggles its state.

GROUND.NAME: Grass
GROUND.DESC2: Players and objects can be placed on it.

ICE.NAME: Ice
ICE.DESC1: A player stepping on it has a 10% chance to slip and fall, immediately ending their turn.
ICE.DESC2: While standing on ice, the player's attack and defense attributes suffer a -2 penalty.

WALL.NAME: Wall
WALL.DESC1: Impassable obstacle unless the player owns a special item.
WALL.DESC2: No object can be placed on it.

CLOSED_DOOR.NAME: Closed Door
CLOSED_DOOR.DESC1: A closed door must be opened via the 'Door' button before passing through.
CLOSED_DOOR.DESC2: Otherwise, it acts as an impassable wall unless the player has a special item.

OPEN_DOOR.NAME: Open Door
OPEN_DOOR.DESC1: An open door allows players to pass through freely.
OPEN_DOOR.DESC2: It can be closed again via the 'Door' button to block passage.

ERROR.MISSING_ATTRIBUTES: Please select the desired attribute values
ERROR.TITLE_INVALID_LENGTH: - The map title must be between 3 and 30 characters long and not contain only spaces
ERROR.NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS: - A map with the same name already exists
ERROR.INVALID_TILE_TYPE: - One or more tile types are invalid
ERROR.INVALID_OBJECT_TYPE: - One or more object types are invalid
ERROR.INVALID_NB_FLAGS: - There must be exactly one flag on the map
ERROR.INVALID_NB_PLAYERS: - The number of players is invalid for the selected map size
ERROR.INVALID_NB_OBJECTS: - The number of objects is invalid for the selected map size

STRATEGIC_RETREAT.TITLE: Strategic Retreat
STRATEGIC_RETREAT.DESCRIPTION: Successfully evade from at least {goal} combat duel
